name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Might_of_the_Tanker_E
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Might of the Tanker E
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Might of the Tanker E
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Tankers and may be slotted into any Tanker damage power.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Might of the Tanker
power_display_names: Superior Might of the Tanker: Accuracy/Damage/Endurance/Recharge
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
